alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 1:55PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Elko and northwestern Eureka Counties through 230 PM PDT... At 154 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carlin, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carlin, Palisade, Emigrant Pass, Emigrant Mine and South Area Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
